knimeNode.name: Outlier Removal
knimeNode.shortDescription: Remove outliers from data according to choosen method

fullDescription.option: choose the outlier detection method (currently only deviation from mean)
Choose which variables from which outliers shall be removed
(deviation from mean) exclude measurements which deviate more than x standard deviations from the mean value of the variable

ports.inPort: Data with variables in the columns and samples in the rows
ports.outPort: As the input table, but outliers removed from all chosen variables
Table which contains one row for each chosen variables indicating the absolute and relative number of removed measurements.

views.view: STDOUT and STDERR of the according R process
